WORK EXPERIENCE:
2 years worked as a Service Crew at Madras Restaurant Delhi.
Duty and Responsibility.
Welcome customers as they arrive at the order counter.
Provide menu to customers and suggest food item as they preference.
Take orders by punching them and repeat order to ensure accuracy.
Prepare order when needed by constantly and checking the order slip for accuracy.
Rotate stored food item to ensure freshness.
Discard any expired item immediately.
Ensure that order and food preparation counter is clean at all times.
Manage cleaning and maintenance activities.
Handle customers' complaints concern.
